titles.title: A resolution to waive the rules and orders of the Senate to allow for the designation of a Vice Chairman of the Select Committee on Indian Affairs and to allow the Vice Chairman to preside at a meeting of such committee in the absence of the chairman.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 4/3/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the Select Committee on Indian Affairs to amend its rules to designate the ranking minority member as vice-chairman and to allow the vice-chairman to preside at committee business meetings in the chairman's absence.
